match.data: 1. Load New File\x0a2. Wave Visualizer\x0a3. EQ Visualizer\x0a4. Power Visualizer\x0a5. Enable Low Pass Filter\x0a6. Enable High Pass Filter\x0a7. Disable Filters\x0a8. Set visualization speed multiplier \x280\x2d9\x29\x0a9. Quit
